alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 6:12AM EST until February 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. North winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...Crawford county. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor visibility during the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will remain in the lower 20s through sunrise.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
